expense.title: Expense
expense.description: Submit business expenses for reimbursement. Include receipts and proper categorization for faster processing.

invoice.title: Invoice
invoice.description: Submit invoices for client billing. Include project details, hours worked, and supporting documentation.

segment.title: Expense Segments
segment.description: Break down expenses into categories for better tracking and reporting. Total must equal the expense amount. Each segment represents a portion of the total expense.

category.title: Category
category.description: Select the appropriate category for this expense segment. Categories help organize expenses for reporting and tax purposes.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Enter the monetary value for this expense segment. The total of all segments must equal the total expense amount.

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.description: Automatically calculated based on the segment amount relative to the total expense. Shows what percentage this segment represents.
